description: Product table containing solar panel specifications

relationship.filter_logic: JOIN product ON package.panel = product.id WHERE product.solar_output_rating = [panelType]

usage_notes.panel_filtering: Filter packages by panel wattage through product relationship
usage_notes.query_pattern: SELECT package.* FROM package JOIN product ON package.panel = product.id WHERE package.panel_qty = X AND package.active = true AND product.solar_output_rating = Y ORDER BY package.price ASC
